thread.title: Gazza de Devon
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Gazza de Devon

author: Gazza de Devon
title: Gazza de Devon
text: Easy to order, good service and nice products. All delivered the right sizes and easy to assemble and fix up. Even give you a couple of spare blades, so no messing around with the odd one that might have a mark or crease. Will definitely use B2G again and would recommend to my friends!
